name: Greenbean Recycle
hours: Sunday: 12:00 AM - 11:59 PM Monday: 12:00 AM - 11:59 PM Tuesday: 12:00 AM - 11:59 PM Wednesday: 12:00 AM - 11:59 PM Thursday: 12:00 AM - 11:59 PM Friday: 12:00 AM - 11:59 PM Saturday: 12:00 AM - 11:59 PM
materials: Plastic #1 (PETE); Plastic #2 (HDPE); Plastic #2 (Color HDPE); Aluminum Cans; Glass (Brown); Glass (Clear); Glass (Green); Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Computer Peripherals; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Come recycle your plastic, glass and aluminum bottles and cans using our Greenbean Reverse Vending Machine at MIT's Stratton Student Center! Compete with your friends and get a real time feedback on how many Kwh of energy you have saved in addition to how many containers you have prevented from entering the landfills. Join teams, create teams and compete in real time! Show everybody how you have helped save the planet by sharing your individual or team impact on Facebook!

Enter challenges and win extra prizes like Best Buy and iTunes gift cards for your recycling efforts! Our America Recycles for Thanksgiving Challenge starts on 11.15.11! Check out gbrecycle.com for more information. 

You also get a 5 cent refund (for eligible containers by Massachusetts Bottle Bill law) to your PayPal account, Student ID account or as a donation to the charity of your choice! Greenbean also recycles non-deposit bottles and cans such as sport drinks, water and iced tea beverages allowing you will see your impact in real time for all.
